entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
